subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: No amount of OFF! repellent or waving hands or swatting Yankee caps could prevent insects from ravaging a playoff game that had been so sublime for the pinstripe pinups.
snippet: No amount of OFF! repellent or waving hands or swatting Yankee caps could prevent insects from ravaging a playoff game that had been so sublime for the pinstripe pinups.
